metadata.dc:title: Mucinous peritoneal carcinomatosis treated with intraperitoneal cisplatin (CDDP) and intravenous 5-FU
metadata.dc:description: • Purpose: To describe the treatment of a slightly frequent clinical entity of variable clinical course.• Material and methods: We present the case of a patient with mucinous peritoneal carcinomatosis,intermediate variant.• Results and conclusion: A suitable cytoreductive surgery, followed by chemotherapy withintraperitoneal CDDP and intravenous 5-FU, can achieve a long survival of patients with peritonealcarcinomatosis, with good tolerance for the treatment
